title: Strengthening Artificial Intelligence Practical Competencies: Emotion-Based Instructional Design Program for Alleviating Math Foreign Language Learning Anxiety

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can reduce anxiety levels by 30% when understanding mathematical vocabulary and concepts.
Learners can perform self-regulation strategies using emotion-aware feedback in over 80% of cases.
Learners can identify at least two anxiety-inducing factors when solving math problems through collaborative learning with peers.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
